Title: Steps of Evil I
Text:
Upon hearing that the Nazgûl fled to Carn Dûm, Glóin told you some of the tale of that ancient fortress.

Carn Dûm is for to the north-west of Rivendell.

Glóin thinks you may be able to learn what the Nazgûl's plan for Carn Dûm is by scouting the borders of that hall for any outlying camps. He warned you not to enter Carn Dûm itself, for it is guarded too strongly by dark things.
CompleteText: See what you can find in the camps near the bridge.
